sourcesContent:
<template>
  <booking-page
    :events="events"
    :current-event="currentEvent"
    :event="event"
    :page-created="pageCreated"
    v-if="pageNo === 0"
  ></booking-page>

  <payment-page
    :event="event"
    v-if="pageNo === 1"
  ></payment-page>
</template>
<script>
  import BookingPage from './components/BookingPage.vue';
  import PaymentPage from './components/PaymentPage.vue';

	export default {
		components: {
      BookingPage,
      PaymentPage
		},
		computed: {
			event() {
				return this.events[this.currentEvent];
			},
		},
		data() {
			return {
				events: [],
				currentEvent: 0,
        pageNo: 1,
        buyers: [],
        ticketData: {
          name: '',
          
        }
			};
		},
		created() {
			this.getEvents();
		},
		methods: {
			async getEvents() {
				let res = await fetch('events.json');
				let data = await res.json();

				this.events = data;
			},
      pageCreated(dataObj) {
        this.buyers.push(dataObj)
        this.pageNo = 1;
        console.log(this.buyers)
      },
		},
	};
</script>
